@Version(value="${api_version}")

Package org.jgrapes.net

Networking related I/O classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TcpChannel
    A special sub channel used for TCP connections.
    TcpServer.TcpServerMXBean
    The Interface of the TcpServer MXBean.
    TcpServer.TcpServerSummaryMXBean
    An MBean interface for getting information about the TCP servers and established connections.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SslCodec
    A component that receives and send byte buffers on an encrypted channel and sends and receives the corresponding decrypted data on a plain channel.
    TcpConnectionManager
    Provides a base class for the TcpServer and the TcpConnector.
    TcpConnector
    A component that reads from or write to a TCP connection.
    TcpServer
    Provides a TCP server.
    TcpServer.TcpServerInfo
    The Class TcpServerInfo.
    TcpServer.TcpServerMXBean.ChannelInfo
    The Class ChannelInfo.

Package org.jgrapes.net Description

Networking related I/O classes.
